title: Fuzzy Female Yordle
body: So when will riot make a female fuzzy yordle. All the males are Furry and for some reason the ladies have blue or purple skin. But in some videos such as the Pentakill Music Video we see fuzzy female yordles.

replies.body:
I think it's a left over of how things used to be.
Females (like Tristana for example) used to be called by something else while Males (Teemo, Corki, Heimer) were Yordles. Over time both were called Yordles to make everything easier. So now while characters like Trist don't look fuzzy in game you could probably say their fur is very short so you don't really notice it from a distance.

I think yordles have sexual dimorphism like how only female black widows are the ones we know normally with males being smaller, brown, lacking the venom to kill humans as well as the familiar hourglass design.

So in this case, make yordles are fuzzy and female yordles look like smurfs
if u look closely at their splash arts poppy and trist are supposed to be fuzzy
